content: - This is truly amazing. Who knew? quote: Jay Walker explains why two billion people around the world are trying to learn English. He shares photos and spine-tingling audio of Chinese students rehearsing English -- "the world's second language" -- by the thousands. *http://www.ted.com/index.php/talks/jay_walker_on_the_world_s_english_mania.html -
